alert.note: Alert for Carver; Dakota; Hennepin; Scott (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 8:45PM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River at Savage affecting Scott, Carver, Dakota and Hennepin Counties. .Warm temperatures will continue to melt upstream snowpack and increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River at Savage. * WHEN...From late Saturday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 705.0 feet, Flood waters begin to impact the park road at Fort Snelling State Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 800 PM CDT Thursday, the stage was 698.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday morning and continue rising to 706.4 feet next Thursday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 702.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 706.4 feet on 04/09/1962. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
